desc: Westwood Gardens is a nursery and garden center with 4 locations in Northwest Arkansas. We now offer Curbside Pickup at our West Fayetteville location - 4324 Wedington Drive.

layout.text:
As of May 30 we have CLOSED our Online Store for purchases.
Please feel free to browse the online inventory to see many of the plants and products we have in our 4 stores in Northwest Arkansas.
Then come on in and see them in person!
Thanks to those of you who purchased online items from us during these difficult times.
